title: Holographic POV Display
description: My open source persistance of vision display. 30 FPS, full RGB color, and 26" diameter. Updates remotely over WIFI. Includes my first experiments with ECAD and PCB fabrication!
tech: Fusion360, KiCad, Raspberry Pi Pico C-SDK, Protothreads, C, PIO
tools: Prusa I3 MK3S 3D Printer, Epilog M2 Laser Cuter
